content:
Here is a GPT-3 prompt based on the steps for writing a good case study article:

"Write a case study article about a specific individual, group, or situation that illustrates a particular concept or issue. In your article, be sure to include an engaging introduction that introduces the subject and provides some context for the reader, a clear and concise presentation of the case study, and analysis and interpretation of the case. In the conclusion, summarize the main points and draw conclusions based on the case, and provide recommendations for future action or research based on your findings. Use strong descriptive language to engage the reader and draw them into the story."
